Class: TurtleFormModuleValidator

TurtleFormModuleValidator(module, element)

Class representing a form validator module.

Constructor

new TurtleFormModuleValidator(module, element)

Creates an instance of the form validator.

Parameters:
Name Type Description
module Object

The module associated with the validator.
element HTMLElement

The form element to validate.

Methods

off(name, callback)

Unregisters an event listener for a specified event name.

Parameters:
Name Type Description
name string

The name of the event.
callback function

The callback function to remove.

on(name, callback)

Registers an event listener for a specified event name.

Parameters:
Name Type Description
name string

The name of the event.
callback function

The callback function to execute when the event occurs.

triggerEvent(name, data)

Triggers an event with the specified name and data.

Parameters:
Name Type Description
name string

The name of the event to trigger.
data *

The data to pass to the event callbacks.

validate()

Validates the form elements based on defined rules and triggers the appropriate events.

validateWhenSubmit(preventopt)

Validates the form when it is submitted, preventing default form submission if specified.

Parameters:
Name Type Attributes Default Description
prevent boolean <optional>
 true

Whether to prevent the default form submission.
